medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports epigastric pain since yesterday at 5 PM, which is continuous, dull in character and has increased over the last 4 hours, mostly in the right upper quadrant (RUQ). No prior similar pain was experienced. Patient reported nausea without emesis and states there has been no change in bowel movements.
medical_history.family_history: Significant for breast cancer in her mother and maternal grandmother, and cardiac disease in her father. A family history of uterine fibroids with a sister and mother who had undergone hysterectomy for this condition.
